DOC.detailed_description: This study enroll adult de novo Ph+ acute lymphoblastic leukemia ( ALL ) patient ( ≥18 year , ≤60 year ) . Induction treatment consist 12 week Dasatinib oral administration ( 140 mg QD ) . Patients initiate treatment steroid 7 day prior start Dasatinib continue day 31 . Patients continue treatment Dasatinib day 84 , except disease progression , intolerable toxicity , withdrawal study . Thereafter : - patient hematological molecular CR receive post-remissional treatment consist Dasatinib alone 6 month period - patient hematological CR persistence molecular disease allografted , eligible donor available , treat 2 cycle Clofarabine-Cyclophosphamide schedule . Patients transplant treated Clofarabine/Cyclophosphamide also receive Dasatinib maintenance treatment relapse progression .
